definition: top student
point (of needle)/sharp/shrewd/pointed
(noun suffix)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: Soon he became the top student at school.
sentences.chinese: 很快他便成了学校里的尖子生。

sentences.english: The same holds true for many of the straight-A students I researched for my book.
sentences.chinese: 这两个事实也应验在我书中调查过的许多尖子生身上。

sentences.english: Wendy Wang, 15, is one of the top students in Shenzhen.
sentences.chinese: 十五岁的王温迪是深圳尖子生之一。

sentences.english: The top students in our class can't work out the problem. It must be very difficult.
sentences.chinese: 我班的尖子生都不能做出那题，它一定很难。

sentences.english: Wendy Wang, 15 must be one of the top students in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 十五岁的王温迪肯定是上海的尖子生之一。

sentences.english: Yeah, our class gathered the best students from Junior 2.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我们班汇集了初二段的所有尖子生。

sentences.english: We always consider him to be a top student.
sentences.chinese: 我们一直认为他是个尖子生。

sentences.english: He is considered a top student in our class.
sentences.chinese: 他被认为是我们班的尖子生。

sentences.english: He is the head boy of our class, and is frequently praised by teachers.
sentences.chinese: 他是我们班的尖子生，总被老师夸。

sentences.english: I was one of the top students in the class.
sentences.chinese: 我学习很好，我是我们班的尖子生。

sentences.english: I'm now top of my class.

definition: weak student
(slang) top student/bookworm
(in the) class
excelling both in morals and studies (idiom); top marks for studies and for behavior (at school)/a paragon of virtue and learning
brilliant student
famous school
entrance exam for senior middle school
top-notch (colloquial)/to push oneself to the front
abbr. for mathematics 數學|数学[shu4 xue2], physics 物理[wu4 li3] and chemistry 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
general middle school

college entrance exam (especially as abbr. for 普通高等學校招生全國統一考試|普通高等学校招生全国统一考试[Pu3 tong1 Gao1 deng3 Xue2 xiao4 Zhao1 sheng1 Quan2 guo2 Tong3 yi1 Kao3 shi4])/(Tw) entrance exam for senior government service posts (abbr. for 公務人員高等考試|公务人员高等考试)
the sciences (as opposed to the humanities 文科[wen2 ke1])
grade/year (in school, college etc)/CL:個|个[ge4]
to overemphasize some topic (at the expense of others)/overdoing it/to go overboard
student who repeats (a course, grade etc) at school
to gain entry by passing an exam/to be admitted to (a college etc)
